posts.text: IDEA反射报错WARNING: An illegal reflective access operation has occurredWARNING: Illegal reflective access by org.xnio.nio.NioXnio$2 (file:/Users/tan/.gradle/caches/modules-2/files-2.1/org.jboss.xnio/xnio-nio/3.3.8.Final/8dafaf230666e526c53e544ab6a9d6ecfcbab4ee/xnio-nio-3.3.8.Final.jar) to constructor sun.nio.ch.KQueueSelectorProvider()WARNING: Please consider reporting this to the maintainers of org.xnio.nio.NioXnio$2WARNING: Use –illegal-access=warn to enable warnings of further illegal reflective access operationsWARNING: All illegal access operations will be denied in a future release 原因 这是因为IDEA默认的jdk版本高于1.8解决方案 下载旧版本jdk over
